name: 唐丞譽
objective: This course focuses on the Power Electronic technologies and related applications. The combination of the electrical energy conversion techniques, modern technologies and next generation products will be included. Main topics of this course are as follows: (1) Introduction of Electrical Energy Processing (2) Basic Power Converters(3) Feedback Controller Design(4) Solar Cell Characteristics (5) Maximum Power Point Tracking(6) Battery Characteristics and Charging/Discharging Technologies(7) Inverter Circuits and Technologies(8) Renewable Energy Generation System(9) Driving System of Electric Vehicles
schedule:
Week 1 : Introduction of electrical energy processing
Week 2-3 : Basic DC/DC power converters 
Week 4 : Feedback controller design
Week 5 : AC/DC converters (PFC)
Week 6 : DC/AC inverters
Week 7 : National holiday
Week 8 : Power semiconductors 
Week 9 : Midterm exam
Week 10-11 : Solar power system
Week 12-13 : Battery characteristics and charging/discharging technologies
Week 14-15 : DC-link voltage control
Week 16-17 : Verbal report
Week 18 : Final exam
scorePolicy:
Attendance rate: 10%
Homework & Quizzes: 15%
Midterm exam: 25%
Final exam: 25%
Verbal Report: 25%
